title: IBuilder (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE IBuilder EXTENDS MBM.IDisposable, STR.IStringRepresentation
A Builder is used to efficiently build a string using Write methods.
It minimizes memory copying.
Methods:
GetBuilderStats
Reset
WriteIString
WriteMemSegment
WriteRune
WriteString
WriteWString
GetCurrentSegment
GetFirstSegment
GetNextSegment
ValidateSegment
